sub_014_system_kui_01:
There’s an ominous black stake driven into
the ground...
sub_014_system_kui_02: Will you pull out the stake?
sub_014_system_kui_03:
When you pulled out the stake, it crumbled
and vanished!
sub_014_system_kui_05:
You heard a mysterious cry coming from the
shrine!
sub_014_system_release_01: A faint sound is coming from within the shrine...
sub_014_system_release_05: Ting-Lu became sealed in the shrine again!
sub_014_system_release_06:
It seems like the shrine won’t open again for a
little while.
sub_014_system_hokora_01: Faint writing is carved into the shrine...
sub_014_system_hokora_03:
“THE RUINOUS VESSEL’S SEAL HAS
BEEN BROKEN”
